header_text: You are invited to a Halloween get-together and will only know a couple of people there. You decide to wear a really elaborate costume. When you arrive, everyone looks at you and probably thinks that you are creative.

elements.Text: Are the people there negatively judging your costume?

elements.name: You are invited to a Halloween get-together and will only know a couple of people there. You decide to wear a really elaborate costume. When you arrive, everyone looks at you and probably thinks that you are creative._Social Situations_comp_question
